detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#108-111) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#109)

AdoreCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#48-54) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[receiver] = SafeMath.add(balances[receiver],numTokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#51)
detectors.markdown:
[AdoreCoin.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#L48-L54) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[receiver] = SafeMath.add(balances[receiver],numTokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#L51)

detectors.description: Constant AdoreCoin.totalSupply_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#26) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

AdoreCoin.smartfastConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#3-79) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply_ = 51000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#26)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- AdoreCoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#40-42)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- AdoreCoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#44-46)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- AdoreCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#48-54)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- AdoreCoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#57-62)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- AdoreCoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AdoreCoin.sol#64-67)
